verses.verse: Now when Ezra<WH5830> had prayed,<WH6419> and when he had confessed,<WH3034> weeping<WH1058> and casting<WH5307> himself down<WH5307> before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> there assembled<WH6908> to him out of Israel<WH3478> a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> congregation<WH6951> of men<WH582> and women<WH802> and children:<WH3206> for the people<WH5971> wept<WH1058> very sore.

And Shechaniah<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel,<WH3171> one of the sons<WH1121> of Elam,<WH5867> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to Ezra,<WH5830> We have trespassed<WH4603> against our God,<WH430> and have taken<WH3427> strange<WH5237> wives<WH802> of the people<WH5971> of the land:<WH776> yet now<WH6258> there is hope<WH4723> in Israel<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> this<WH2063> thing.

Now<WH6258> therefore let us make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with our God<WH430> to put<WH3318> away<WH3318> all<WH3605> the wives,<WH802> and such as are born<WH3205> of them, according to the counsel<WH6098> of my lord,<WH136> and of those that tremble<WH2730> at the commandment<WH4687> of our God;<WH430> and let it be done<WH6213> according to the law.<WH8451>
Arise;<WH6965> for this matter<WH1697> belongs to you: we also will be with you: be of good courage,<WH2388> and do<WH6213> it.

Then arose<WH6965> Ezra,<WH5830> and made the chief<WH8269> priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> to swear<WH7650> that they should do<WH6213> according to this<WH2088> word.<WH1697> And they swore.<WH7650>

Then Ezra<WH5830> rose<WH6965> up from before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> and went<WH3212> into<WH413> the chamber<WH3957> of Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Eliashib:<WH475> and when he came<WH3212> thither,<WH8033> he did eat<WH398> no<WH3808> bread,<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water:<WH4325> for he mourned<WH56> because<WH5921> of the transgression<WH4604> of them that had been carried<WH1473> away.<WH1473>

And they made proclamation<WH5674> <WH6963> throughout Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389> to all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of the captivity,<WH1473> that they should gather<WH6908> themselves together to Jerusalem;<WH3389>

And that whoever<WH3605> would not come<WH935> within three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> according to the counsel<WH6098> of the princes<WH8269> and the elders,<WH2205> all<WH3605> his substance<WH7399> should be forfeited,<WH2763> and himself<WH1931> separated<WH914> from the congregation<WH6951> of those that had been carried<WH1473> away.<WH1473>

Then all<WH3605> the men<WH582> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144> gathered<WH6908> themselves together to Jerusalem<WH3389> within three<WH7969> days.<WH3117> It was the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH2320> on the twentieth<WH6242> day of the month;<WH2320> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> sat<WH3427> in the street<WH7339> of the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> trembling<WH7460> because<WH5921> of this matter,<WH1697> and for the great rain.<WH1653>

And Ezra<WH5830> the priest<WH3548> stood<WH6965> up, and said<WH559> to them, You have transgressed,<WH4603> and have taken<WH3427> strange<WH5237> wives,<WH802> to increase<WH3254> the trespass<WH819> of Israel.<WH3478>

Now<WH6258> therefore make<WH5414> confession<WH8426> to the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> and do<WH6213> his pleasure:<WH7522> and separate<WH914> yourselves from the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> and from the strange<WH5237> wives.<WH802>
Then all<WH3605> the congregation<WH6951> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> As you have said,<WH1697> so<WH3651> must<WH5921> we do.<WH6213>

But the people<WH5971> are many,<WH7227> and it is a time<WH6256> of much rain,<WH1653> and we are not able<WH3581> to stand<WH5975> without,<WH2351> neither<WH3808> is this a work<WH4399> of one<WH259> day<WH3117> or two:<WH8147> for we are many<WH7235> that have transgressed<WH6586> in this<WH2088> thing.<WH1697>

Let now<WH4994> our rulers<WH8269> of all<WH3605> the congregation<WH6951> stand,<WH5975> and let all<WH3605> them which have taken<WH3427> strange<WH5237> wives<WH802> in our cities<WH5892> come<WH935> at appointed<WH2163> times,<WH6256> and with them the elders<WH2205> of every city,<WH5892> and the judges<WH8199> thereof, until<WH5704> the fierce<WH2740> wrath<WH639> of our God<WH430> for this<WH2088> matter<WH1697> be turned<WH7725> from us.

Only<WH389> Jonathan<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Asahel<WH6214> and Jahaziah<WH3167> the son<WH1121> of Tikvah<WH8616> were employed<WH5975> about<WH5921> this<WH2063> matter: and Meshullam<WH4918> and Shabbethai<WH7678> the Levite<WH3881> helped<WH5826> them.

And the children<WH1121> of the captivity<WH1473> did<WH6213> so.<WH3651> And Ezra<WH5830> the priest,<WH3548> with certain<WH582> chief<WH7218> of the fathers,<WH1> after the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> and all<WH3605> of them by their names,<WH8034> were separated,<WH914> and sat<WH3427> down in the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the tenth<WH6224> month<WH2320> to examine<WH1875> the matter.<WH1697>
And they made an end<WH3615> with all<WH3605> the men<WH582> that had taken<WH3427> strange<WH5237> wives<WH802> by the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the first<WH7223> month.<WH2320>

And among the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> there were found<WH4672> that had taken<WH3427> strange<WH5237> wives:<WH802> namely, of the sons<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3442> the son<WH1121> of Jozadak,<WH3136> and his brothers;<WH251> Maaseiah,<WH4641> and Eliezer,<WH461> and Jarib,<WH3402> and Gedaliah.<WH1436>

And they gave<WH5414> their hands<WH3027> that they would put<WH3318> away<WH3318> their wives;<WH802> and being guilty,<WH816> they offered a ram<WH352> of the flock<WH6629> for their trespass.<WH819>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Immer;<WH564> Hanani,<WH2607> and Zebadiah.<WH2069>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Harim;<WH2766> Maaseiah,<WH4641> and Elijah,<WH452> and Shemaiah,<WH8098> and Jehiel,<WH3171> and Uzziah.<WH5818>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Pashur;<WH6583> Elioenai,<WH454> Maaseiah,<WH4641> Ishmael,<WH3458> Nethaneel,<WH5417> Jozabad,<WH3107> and Elasah.<WH501>
Also of the Levites;<WH3881> Jozabad,<WH3107> and Shimei,<WH8096> and Kelaiah,<WH7041> (the same<WH1933> is Kelita,<WH7042>) Pethahiah,<WH6611> Judah,<WH3063> and Eliezer.<WH461>
Of the singers<WH7891> also; Eliashib:<WH475> and of the porters;<WH7778> Shallum,<WH7967> and Telem,<WH2928> and Uri.<WH221>
